item.description:
This Brunch is specifically for our Diamond Members... So if you fit the criteria for Diamond status (Please Look at "About" page on the groups status bar to understand your status)

You loyal Madams get to sign up for our event this month at French Restaurant “The Pomme Café” in Astoria, which will feature a a discounted prefix menu, wine cheese tasting, games, and much more!
We just want to show you ladies that we appreciate you for being consistant, loyal and reliable members. So if you know for sure you can make it this Saturday please sign up!

All for you darling! Check it out!
http://www.yelp.com/b...

Thanks Lovelies!!
Lisa
MWN Organizer
item.why: Celebrate V-Day&ourselves as Diamonds at this month's brunch.Wear something Red or Pink,drink a Diamonds Cocktail&enjoy the festivities with us!A $2-5 donation is suggested donation is requested to show thanks to the hostesses for all their efforts!
item.name: "Diamond Madame's-Valentine's Day 'Red/Pink' Brunch,‚Äù at the Pomme Cafe!!
